TITLE: Resize your videos online
META: Easiest way to resize your videos online
LABEL: DOCX to PDF

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Our website is platform independent. It works on both Window and iOS Operating systems and can be used without any downloads required.
The conversion is absolutely free, so you can convert as many files as you want.
Our website prioritises its customers’ privacy. Since we work with cloud storage your files do not get uploaded. So, no chance of getting any data breach. Your data is safe with us!
The conversion process hardly takes a few seconds, depending on your file size, and you can get quick results easily.
Video editing is really fast and you can get your job done in no time
Our website is platform independent, can work on laptops, tabs and phones and the conversion is quick, it saves time.

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to resize your video
steps: Wait patiently till the video gets loaded
Click save to download your video

FAQ.question: What is meant by resizing the video?
FAQ.answer: Resizing the video means changing the file size of your video. Suppose you have a file that is 10 MB, and you want it to be less than 5 MB, or vice versa, you can resize your video. Do to this, you can change the resolution of the video.

FAQ.question: What are the resolutions available and what will be the size of the file of different resolutions?
FAQ.answer: Resize Video provides all the standard resolutions i.e., 1080p, 720p, 480p, 360p, and 240p. Keep in mind that a higher resolution file size will be more than a file with lower resolution. The size of the file will also depend on the length of the video, the resolution, the aspect ratio and the CRF values.

FAQ.question: Will resizing affect the quality of my videos?
FAQ.answer: Yes, in order to decrease the file size, you will have to compromise on the quality of the video.

FAQ.question: Can I upload and resize any other file type?
FAQ.answer: With Resize Video, you can upload and resize any type of video file that you want. It supports MP4, MOV, FLV, AVI, MKV and other video files type.

FAQ.question: Why is it taking so long to process my file?
FAQ.answer: The time taken to resize and process your video depend on the size, aspect ratio and the resolution you have chosen. If your file size is bigger, it will take a bit longer than regular files.

FAQ.question: Which Windows versions does Resize Video support?
FAQ.answer: Resize Video is completely web-based and therefore provides cross-platform support. This means that our tool supports all versions of Windows. It not only works on windows operating system, but can work on any other operating system, that supports a browser.
Yes, our website works on browser, and therefore supports both iOS and Android platforms.
FAQ.question: Does it support both Android and iOS platforms?
Will my uploaded files be saved on the server?
FAQ.answer: All processing is done on your browser, and no files are transferred to the server. Hence your files are 100% safe.

FAQ.question: Will I have to create an account to use Resize Video?
FAQ.answer: Our website does not require you to sign up or create an account. The platform is absolutely free and you can compress as many files as you want.

FAQ.question: Will I be charged to use the website?
FAQ.answer: Our website is absolutely free and you can use it as many times as you want. There are no free trial uses, after which you will have to pay for using our services. We won't charge you anything.

FAQ.question: How can I resize multiple videos?
FAQ.answer: Resize Video allows you to resize multiple files, one after the other. When you resize one file and click on save, the video will be processed. After the video has been processes, you can see download option on the screen. By clicking on it you can download the resized file. In order to resize another video, you only need to refresh the browser and you will see upload Video option. Now you can again select your file which you want to resize.

FAQ.question: I refreshed the browser by mistake. What do I do?
FAQ.answer: Since our website does not use any servers and does not store your data, the file that you have uploaded, will not be saved. You need to reupload the file to resize it.

acceptedAnswer.text:
Most unopened items in new condition and returned within 90 days will receive a refund or exchange. Some items have a modified return policy noted on the receipt or packing slip. Items that are opened or damaged or do not have a receipt may be denied a refund or exchange. Items purchased online or in-store may be returned to any store.

Online purchases may be returned via a major parcel carrier. Click here to initiate a return.

mainEntity.name: How long does it take to process a refund?

acceptedAnswer.text: We will reimburse you for returned items in the same way you paid for them. For example, any amounts deducted from a gift card will be credited back to a gift card. For returns by mail, once we receive your return, we will process it within 4–5 business days. It may take up to 7 days after we process the return to reflect in your account, depending on your financial institution's processing time.

mainEntity.name: What is the policy for late/non-delivery of items ordered online?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Our local teams work diligently to make sure that your order arrives on time, within our normaldelivery hours of 9AM to 8PM in the recipient's time zone. During busy holiday periods like Christmas, Valentine's and Mother's Day, we may extend our delivery hours before 9AM and after 8PM to ensure that all gifts are delivered on time. If for any reason your gift does not arrive on time, our dedicated Customer Service agents will do everything they can to help successfully resolve your issue.

Click here to complete the form with your order-related question(s).

mainEntity.name: When will my credit card be charged?

acceptedAnswer.text: We'll attempt to securely charge your credit card at the point of purchase online. If there's a problem, you'll be notified on the spot and prompted to use another card. Once we receive verification of sufficient funds, your payment will be completed and transferred securely to us. Your account will be charged in 24 to 48 hours.

mainEntity.name: Will I be charged sales tax for online orders?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Local and State sales tax will be collected if your recipient's mailing address is in:
  • Arizona
  • California
  • Colorado
